DescriptionOfIncident: The National Trust recalls biscuits due to a labelling error
RiskToConsumers: Peanuts and or tree nuts. These products may contain nuts making them a possible health risk for anyone with an allergy to peanuts and/or tree nuts.

DescriptionOfIncident: Farmhouse Biscuits Ltd recalls its Honey & Oat Biscuits due to undeclared wheat
RiskToConsumers: Wheat (gluten). This product contains wheat making it a possible health risk for anyone with an allergy or intolerance to wheat or gluten

RiskToConsumers: Celery and/or Mustard. These products contain celery and/or mustard making them a possible health risk for anyone with an allergy to celery and/or mustard.

DescriptionOfIncident: Booths Honey & Spelt Bread recalled because of undeclared allergens
